name: LASERFACE
description:
Blow up the city and cause destruction with the LASER on your FACE.

Your LASERFACE.

Requires an Oculus Rift. I've only tested this on a DK2, I don't think it works on the DK1 (sorry!).

Press space to fire your laser!

Greg Westland - Code and level design

Nathan Wentworth - UI, supplimental code, art direction

Tyler White - Art
